ygData.subject: Dale
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, it sounds like you re my kind of player. Have you taken a whack at the TevFifty yet? If not, please do, and don t use cheats. It should be entertaining...

From: "Tom Tildrum" <Tevildo@...>

Ah, it sounds like you're my kind of player. Have you taken a whack at the 
TevFifty yet? If not, please do, and don't use cheats. It should be 
entertaining... I just wish I could get my levels posted on the official 
Gladiator page. Tom said that would be okay, as long as they don't suck... 
an interesting sentiment when the Tryxian Chronicles, located on the FSGames 
site, is the crappiest set anyone here has ever seen. For now, they're still 
at http://uk.geocities.com/tevgames.

Yes, I've played with a solo Druid, and there's no point to summoning 
faeries UNLESS you plan to use them to draw the enemy's attention. If so, 
slap a few Protections on it and it's good to go. Druids are good as snipers 
(that lightning is fast, powerful, and long-ranged) as well as hand-to-hand 
(yeah, just get up close and personal and keep attempting to plant a tree 
where the enemy is standing). I can't think of any other character type 
that's as well-rounded, with the possible exception of soldiers with 
boomerangs going all the time. And that's just nutty.

Dale, looking forward to seeing your levels.
     -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
